did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, subject files, clippings and background information, scrapbooks, photographs and awards.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, subject files, clippings and background information, scrapbooks, photographs, awards, and other material of the personal life and professional career of a writer, historian, and director of Historic Ithaca. Subject files compile research on subjects of local interest and local history. Family papers of Sisler's parents, Eleanor and Frederick Untiedt.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, subject files, clippings and background information, scrapbooks, photographs, awards, and other material of the personal life and professional career of a writer, historian, and director of Historic Ithaca. Subject files compile research on subjects of local interest and local history. Family papers of Sisler's parents, Eleanor and Frederick Untiedt.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Carol Sisler papers, #4925. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Related collections: Daniel G. Sisler Papers, #21-1-2825, http://resolver.library.cornell.edu/cgi-bin/EADresolver?id=RMA02825.

did.unittitle: "Enterprising Families" alphabetical research files and photographs
Scrapbooks, framed and unframed photos and documents
Letters to the Untiedt family; photos and volumes
Eleanor and Frederick Untiedt letters and photos
